segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, completely oblivious to the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is filling up rapidly, and the water is spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is solely on the plate she's drying, as if nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, quietly scheming to get some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet before the kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
